name: Reign Away
description:
>CONTENT WARING<

There is death and sensitive topics in this game.

~Story~

Reign Away is a short story about two characters: Reign and Amanda. Amanda has an issue that only Reign can help with. Follow their story and discovery the truth behind Amanda's past.

~Credits~

DanMakesBadGames - Game Design, Story, Audio

TheNate_Playz - Programming 

PugSquadGaming Media - Art

~The OST is available when the game is finished*~

~Project Info~

Reign Away was a short project I made in a few days to test out developing in Clickteam Fusion 2.5.

*The carnival song (Mid June Night's Dream) will not be included in the OST.
